snippet: The director Craig Goodwill’s musical fairy tale, inspired by Eastern European folklore, features vivified toys that revolt against an unscrupulous corporate overlord.
abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews movie Patch Town, directed by Craig Goodwill and starring Rob Ramsay.
lead_paragraph: The director Craig Goodwill’s musical fairy tale, inspired by Eastern European folklore, features vivified toys that revolt against an unscrupulous corporate overlord.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Patch Town,’ Animated Toys Work the Factory Line
headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘Patch Town,’ Animated Toys Work the Factory Line
